description.en:
Isabelle is an orphan living in a temple with lots of knowledge about the love between men and women thanks to red covered novels that the saints had sneaked in.

But then, she found out that a priest secretly sold her to be a one-night stand for the duke who kills his lovers due to the shame of his inability to perform…

There’s only one way to get out of this, and it is to be a married woman.

At that moment, Isabelle recalled her childhood friend, Riggs, who said he wasn’t interested in dating.

“So, Riggs, marry me.”

“…What?”

“Nobles would refuse unless it’s a pure woman.”

“…Why do you hate the Duke of Cardiago so much?”

“Everything else is fine. Being a tyrant? If you’ve lived your life to the fullest, that could happen. But there can be no problems at night.”

Riggs was so frustrated that it seemed like he was going crazy.

A few days later, the reclusive Duke of Cardiago came to the temple.

Of course, the most surprising thing to Isabelle was the true identity of her childhood friend.

“Isabelle, you wanted to get married. You can’t say no because you proposed first. I’m the closest man to your ideal type anyway.”

“My ideal type?”

“Don’t I know your ideal type? You like guys who are tall, handsome, smell of soap at night, and sleep in simple clothes. Also, on the first night, the bed should break.”

“…”

“That’s everything, and I can do it all for you. So marry me.”

She once knew everything about her childhood friend, but that changed the moment they got married.

“Riggs, slow down…”

“I think I’m slow enough.”

“You weren’t always this impatient.”

Isabelle said pleadingly, but Riggs replied with a smirk.

“I was a childhood friend then, but now I’m your husband.”

---
Isabelle has always dreamed of meeting her true love and living happily ever after. Unfortunately, she discovers that she was just sold to the monstrous Duke Cardiego, who's infamous for killing his bride candidates. Her only way out is to quickly marry someone else, and as it turns out, her BFF, Lix, is the perfect choice! Although she tells him she will just stay a friend, Lix begins to show her that he doesn't feel the same way. Will their friendship be able to last through this matrimony?

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！
___

description.en:
There are animals that were abandoned by Dangun and live secretly in the human world. Narae, an ordinary high school student, discovers their existence...
A modern version of Beauty and the Beast with comedy and exorcism action.

‘Will the project of becoming human, for the animals that could not become human, be successful?'

Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

description.en:
"Won't you become a Goblin's bride?"   
  
In Yang-an, the capital of the Shun Dynasty Empire, there are rumors of a Goddess who sings a song that grants your wishes in your dreams if you visit a certain pharmacy. To confirm this, Sa Heonyoung, who disguises his status as a member of the royal family, goes to find the Goddess of the rumors. After listening to her song, he yearns for her, as if he is suffering from an illness…  
  
A man who must kill his own identity under a goblin's mask; and a woman who has no name or a lover, and lives only for the revenge in her mother's will. A mournful love story between a man and a woman who are the only ones who can fully understand each other.

description.ko:
"도깨비의 신부가 되지 않겠습니까?“

순나라의 황도 양안. 어느 약방에 찾아가면 신녀가 꿈속에서 소원을 이뤄 주는 노래를 불러 준다는 소문이 파다하다. 이를 검증하기 위해 신분을 속인 채 다른 이들 틈에 섞여 신녀를 찾아간 친왕, 사헌영. 그는 신녀의 노래를 듣고 난 뒤, 병을 앓듯 그녀를 찾게 되는데….

도깨비 가면을 쓴 채 자신을 죽이고 살아가야만 하는 남자. 외로운 산 속에서 하루 하루 죽음만을 기다리며 살아가는 이름 없는 여자. 온전히 자신을 알아주는 건 서로밖에 없는 남녀의 애절한 사랑 이야기.

「妳願意當鬼怪的新娘嗎？」順王朝的帝都仰安有個傳聞，城裡某間藥房有一位能用歌聲讓人在夢中願望成真的巫女。為了證實這個傳聞，順王朝親王──思軒英，隱瞞自身身分親自去見了這位巫女，然而在聽完巫女的歌聲後，彷彿得了相思病一般，一直不斷找她…。一位只能戴著鬼怪面具隱藏自己真實身分的男子、一位在孤寂的山中等待死亡日度一日的女子，相遇後發現真正理解自己的只有彼此，一則關於男女愛戀情愁的故事。【​本作品為官方正式授權之15歲版本，請讀者們多多支持。】​

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

title.en: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends

altTitles.zh: 靠发小我变身顶级向导

description.en: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...

altTitles.ja: 乙女の地球の走りかた

altTitles.en: Girl's way of running the planet

description.en:
Ayumi Miyamura came to Mt. Mitake in Okutama, Tokyo to lose weight.
On her way to the trailhead, she encounters a strange runner who dashed past her and entered the mountain from a back road. Unbeknownst to her, this was her first encounter with a map and compass, and the start of her quest to participate in an "adventure race."

This is the start of a next-generation outdoor manga about enjoying nature with all one's being.
description.id: Ayumi Miyamura, yang mendaki gunung untuk berdiet, bertemu dengan seorang gadis misterius yang mendaki gunung tanpa jalan daki.

altTitles.th: เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
description.pt-br: O estudante Yugi Mutou passou a maior parte de seu tempo sozinho jogando jogos - até que ele resolveu o Enigma do Milênio, um artefato egípcio misterioso! Possuída pelo quebra-cabeça, Yugi se torna o Yu-Gi-Oh(O Rei dos Jogos), e irá enfrentar os desafios dos Jogos das Sombras - Jogos mortais com grandes apostas e altos riscos, como apostar a sua alma e a alma de seus queridos amigos! O mangá contém novas histórias não vistas no anime, incluindo a origem de Yugi e seus amigos!

title.en: The Merman Trapped in My Lake

altTitles.en: A Merman I Imprisoned in My Lake
The Mermaid I Locked in My Lake

description.en: “Selvaine, why haven’t you come to see me?” A person, no, a mermaid, calling out to my great-grandfather’s granddaughter who had resembled me. My ancestor, who had treasured the mermaid so, locked him in her lake. What would he have been thinking, waiting for someone who had been dead for over a hundred years. Enduring terrible agony, every day, day after day. Maybe, “I missed you.” … That’s clearly revenge.

Two years have passed since Eden was trapped in a dark fantasy game set in a medieval world with a reputation for extreme difficulty.

He has struggled as a paladin and succeeded in destroying 49 demons, now finally able to proceed with the main story of the game. However, the more he plays, the more irregularities occur and the story and relationships with the NPCs change.

Will he be able to prevent the destruction in the game and survive despite the numerous irregularities?
description.ko: 극악 난이도를 자랑하는 멸망 위기의 중세 다크 판타지 배경의 게임 속에 떨어진지 2년. 아이덴은 성기사로서 분투하여 49명의 악마를 멸하는 것에 성공, 성기사로 임명 받으며, 드디어 게임 속 메인 스토리를 진행할 수 있게 된다. 그러나 플레이를 하면 할수록 변칙이 생기며 틀어지는 스토리와 NPC들과의 관계. 수많은 변칙에도 불구하고 게임 속 멸망을 막고 자신도 살아남을 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Dois anos se passaram desde que Eden ficou preso em um jogo de fantasia sombria ambientado em um mundo medieval conhecido por sua dificuldade extrema. Ele lutou como paladino, destruindo 49 demônios. Finalmente, agora podendo avançar na história principal do jogo. No entanto, quanto ele mais joga, mais irregularidades ocorrem, afetando a história e os relacionamentos com os NPCs. Conseguirá ele evitar a destruição no jogo e sobreviver apesar das inúmeras irregularidades?

altTitles.en: A Saint Adopted by the Grand Duke
A Saint Who Was Adopted by the Grand Duke
A Saintess Who Was Adopted by the Grand Duke

altTitles.es-la: Una santa adoptada por el gran duque

altTitles.th: นักบุญหญิงผู้ถูกตระกูลแกรนด์ดยุกรับเลี้ยง

altTitles.ja: 大公家に転がり込んできた聖女様

description.en:
I was forced to live in captivity for the rest of my life because I happened to be aware of the fact that I was a saint. I was truly a 'real' saint, but that didn’t matter, because there was already a designated saint in the temple. When I died from all the abuse I endured, I was sent back to a time before all those previous events in my life had happened. After fifteen regressions, I was exhausted.

I prayed, "I don't want anything to do with this, so please just let me die."

And at the moment when I thought could finally be able to die, someone said, "How about being my daughter?"

…That monstrous grand duke adopted me.

---
"I want to quit. I don't want to live being exploited again."

Despite having the powers of a saint, she had to live her entire life in captivity—all for the sake of the fake saint who was anointed in secret. Unable to endure the torture any longer, she died alone and returned back in time. Daina, who chose a different path at the end of her forced repeated regressions, was adopted by the Grand Duke in a twist of fate…

"As the sole daughter of the Teresia family, I will make it so that you have everything."

Now that she has a new name and understands the importance of family, Daina decides to exact revenge so she can no longer be used by the temple.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EA%B0%80%EC%97%90-%EC%9E%85%EC%96%91%EB%90%9C-%EC%84%B1%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/3524), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61913707)
description.es-la: Me vi obligada a vivir en cautiverio por el resto de mi vida porque me di cuenta del hecho de que era una santa. Yo era verdaderamente una santa 'real', pero eso no importaba, porque ya había una santa designada en el templo. Cuando morí por todo el abuso que soporté, fui enviada de regreso a un tiempo antes de que sucedieran todos esos eventos anteriores en mi vida. Después de 15 regresiones, estaba exhausta. Oré: "No quiero tener nada que ver con esto, así que por favor déjame morir". Y en ese momento en que finalmente pude morir, alguien dijo: "¿Qué tal ser mi hija?" …. Ese monstruoso duque me había adoptado.

altTitles.ja: ギャルに優しいオタク君

description.en: Otakura is a high school boy who's clearly an otaku, and Narumi is a high school gal. Normally, these two polar opposites would never cross paths, even at school. But by a strange coincidence, it turns out Otakura is able to use his inherently handy nature to help out Narumi with her own hobby-related requests, one after another?
description.id:
Odakura, seorang anak SMA yang terlihat otaku, dan Narumi, seorang gadis SMA yang terlihat seperti seorang gal. Awalnya, mereka adalah dua kutub yang berlawanan yang tidak akur di sekolah, tetapi secara kebetulan, Odakura menggunakan ketangkasan alaminya untuk mengabulkan permintaan Narumi satu demi satu!? 

Komedi romantis remaja sekolahmu♪
description.ja:
見た目がオタクな男子高校生の小田倉と、ギャルな女子高生の鳴海。
本来は学校でも交わらない真逆のタイプの二人だったけれど、ひょんなことから小田倉は持ち前の手先の器用さで、鳴海の趣味に関するお願い事を次々と叶えていって!?

ギャルの趣味を理解するオタク君の学園青春ラブコメディー♪

---

Mitame ga otakuna danshi kōkōsei no Odagura to, gyaruna mesukōsei no Narumi. Honrai wa gakkō demo majiwaranai magyaku no taipu no futaridattakeredo, hyon'nakotokara Odagura wa mochimae no tesaki no kiyō-sa de, Narumi no shumi ni kansuru o negaigoto o tsugitsugi to kanaete itte!? 

Gyaru no shumi o rikai suru otaku-kun no gakuen seishun rabukomedī ♪
description.pt-br: Odakura, um garoto do ensino médio que parece um otaku, e Narumi, uma garota do ensino médio que se parece com uma gal. Originalmente, eles eram polares opostos que não se davam bem na escola, mas por acaso, Odakura usou sua destreza natural para conceder os desejos da Narumi um após o outro!? Sua comédia romântica escolar da juventude.

description.en: Xia Xiaotao, a tone-deaf ordinary girl changes her body with Ling Xi, a superstar and her idol. After experiencing various types of chaos, accidents and setbacks, she gradually stars living a wonderful life in the entertainment circle by conquering different princes charming, and becoming a superstar famous in films, TV and singing!
Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
description.ko:
유전자조작 쥐로 알려져 있는 아이 HANA(하나),
하나가 연구실에서 탈출하면서 일어나는 이야기들.

altTitles.en: Manga Diary of a Male Porn Star

description.en: When your company goes bankrupt and your marriage is on the rocks, what’s a guy to do? Move to Tokyo to become an adult film star, of course! This diary-style comedy explores the pitfalls of an everyman who tries to break into the world of porno because it seems like a pleasurable way to restart his life. He soon learns that it’s a harder job than he bargained for!

title.en: My Wife Is Actually the Empress?

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Jiā Niángzǐ Jìngrán Shì Nǚ Dì?
Wo Jia Niangzi Jingran Shi Nv Di?

altTitles.vi: Nương Tử Nhà Ta Là Nữ Đế

description.en: With my wife's breathtaking beauty, not even the newly enthroned empress can match her! With my wife's marvelous culinary skills, not even the empress's royal chefs can match her! My wife loves me and cares about me very very much, and I wouldn't trade her for even the empress! Wait, what? My wife is the empress?!
description.vi: Lão bà nhà ta xinh đẹp như hoa, cho dù là Tân Nữ Đế đăng cơ cũng không sánh nổi! Lão bà nhà ta trù nghệ cao siêu, cho dù là Nữ Đế ngự thiện phòng cũng không sánh nổi! Lão bà nhà ta rất yêu ta, rất quan tâm ta, có cho ta Nữ Đế ta cũng không thèm! Cái gì? Lão bà nhà ta lại chính là Nữ Đế!?
description.zh: 我家老婆貌美如花，哪怕是新登基的女帝都比不上！ 我家老婆厨艺高超，哪怕是女帝的御膳房都比不上！ 我家老婆很爱我，很关心我，就算是给个女帝我都不换！ 什么？我家老婆竟然就是女帝！？

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士Zガンダム Define シャア・アズナブル 赤の分水嶺

altTitles.en: Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Define - Char Aznable: Red Frontier

description.en: Universal Century 0087, seven years after the end of the One Year War between the Earth Federation and the Principality of Zeon. Ensign Reccoa Londe has provided the Anti-Earth Union Group (AEUG) with information regarding possible mobile suit development at the civilian colonies of Green Noa. Lieutenant Quattro (Char Aznable) with his wingmen Lieutenant JGs Apolly (Andy) and Roberto (Ricardo) head to the colonies to investigate. On Green Noa 1, Kamille Bidan is rushing to the spaceport where the Temptation, a ship a former One Year War ace is on, is docking. He’s hoping to get an autograph from the famed Captain Bright Noa. As Bright explains that he’s on duty, Jerid and company interrupt the two. Jerid smacktalks Bright for receiving a two rank demotion upon refusing to join the Titans and grabs Kamille’s photo saying he should sign it as an elite member of the Federation. The two get into a scuffle and Kamille is hauled off for questioning. Matosh questions Kamille about being an AEUG insider but just then he’s freed after his story checks out. Just as the handcuffs come off, the Gundam MK-II crashes into the building…
description.pt-br: Universal Century 0087, sete anos após o fim da Guerra de Um Ano entre a Federação da Terra e o Principado de Zeon. O alferes Reccoa Londe forneceu ao Grupo da União Anti-Terra (AEUG) informações sobre o possível desenvolvimento de trajes móveis nas colônias civis de Green Noa. Tenente Quattro (Char Aznable) com seus alas Tenente JGs Apolly (Andy) e Roberto (Ricardo) vão para as colônias para investigar. No Green Noa 1, Kamille Bidan está correndo para o porto espacial onde o Temptation, um navio em que um ex-ás da Guerra de Um Ano está ligado, está atracando. Ele espera conseguir um autógrafo do famoso Capitão Bright Noa. Enquanto Bright explica que ele está de plantão, Jerid e companhia interrompem os dois. Jerid critica Bright por receber um rebaixamento de dois escalões ao se recusar a se juntar aos Titãs e pega a foto de Kamille dizendo que ele deveria assiná-la como um membro de elite da Federação. Os dois entram em uma briga e Kamille é levada para interrogatório. Matosh questiona Kamille sobre ser um AE.

description.en: After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
description.ko:
바다에 빠져 실종된 후, 무인도에서 7년 만에 살아 돌아온 우영장의 좌충우돌 문명 적응기!
그의 몸은 단단한 근육질로 변했고 온갖 동물과의 의사소통은 물론, 특별한 능력까지 구사하며 사건사고가 끊이질 않는다.
과연 영장은 밀림보다 무섭다는 도시에서 살아남을 수 있을까?

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?
description.pt-br: Uma série de acidentes misteriosos acontecem um atrás do outro na cidade. Um ser demoníaco está desafiando a todos que os resolvam. Sumireko, uma aparentemente caixa comum de loja, deseja ser uma escritora e possui um corpo voluptuoso com muitos admiradores ardentes. Adashino, um admirador que parece com um jovem garoto é o caixa de uma livraria. Ele está mergulhado em mistérios, e de repente, o caminho pra ele e sua irmã voltarem para casa (em outro mundo) aparece. Uma história moderna de romance e aspirações começa!

altTitles.th: เกาะกระหายเลือด ฝ่า 48 วันโลกวิกฤต

description.en: The human army lost the battle against the vampires on Higanjima Island. Unable to prevent Miyabi's plan, Japan has become a vampire country. Six months later, there is a one-armed man fighting the vampires in abandoned Japan! The man's name is Akira Miyamoto. A warrior who has already tasted hell on Higanjima.

It is said that when the lifespan of a human being come to its end, it is necessary to leave behind everything; family, friends, achievements, even love and meet black and white messengers who will lead them to the cycle of reincarnation. However, the infatuations and love in mind; engraved in the bone, how can it be so easy to give it up. When love has gone through the battle of time either it is it still flawless or the wreckage full of holes.

Another Translation
Legend says that when one’s time is up, only when all traces of love from your previous life must be erased, led by the deities of the Impermanence of Black and White , will you be reborn. And yet a breathtaking, extraordinary love that makes you lose your mind could never be so easily forgotten. When love undergoes the test of time, is what remains the same, pure love, or will that love be battered and bruised, unrecognizable?

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

altTitles.vi: Trên vợ chồng, dưới người yêu

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

title.en: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

altTitles.es-la: Una princesa que trabaja duro por su favorito

altTitles.en: The Princess is Secretly a Fan

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a novel with my living and breathing bias.
Now I’m an Imperial Princess, who is known by all sorts of epithets, Agnes Saint!

It’s great that she’s filthy rich and a royal and all, but there’s just one problem…
the hateful trash who just insulted by bias’s very existence is none other than ‘me.’

Regardless, I’m here now and…
I will do anything, and everything, within my power to prevent my bias’s death and ensure he experiences nothing but smooth sailing going forward!

I would never wish for Kylo, my kitten, to suffer any sort of shock.
That’s why I have to hide my fervent adoration.
Besides, nothing good would come from revealing my stanning anyways.
So, for the time being, I’ll be perfect at… 

‘stanning in secret.’

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ja: 幽霊肯定派の女子校生・綾瀬桃と、同級生の怪奇現象オタク・オカルト君。互いに否定するUFOと怪異を信じさせるため、桃はUFOスポットの病院廃墟へ、オカルト君は心霊スポットのトンネルへ行くのだが…。運命の恋が始まる!?
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.uk:
Чорти, чудовиська, позаземці, підлітковий роман, махачі та дідько б їх узяв… раковини! У цій манзі ви знайдете все!

Окультний фанбой Такакура, його подруга Аясе та їх надприродні пригоди у новій психоломній манзі!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Inner Palace Notebook of Mysteries

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと～猫猫の後宮謎解き手帳～

description.en:
In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the female apothecary from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young apothecary  will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!?  
  


---
description.ja: 誘拐された挙句、とある大国の後宮に売り飛ばされた薬屋の少女・猫猫（マオマオ）。年季が明けるまで大人しくしようと決めていた猫猫だったが、あるとき皇帝の子どもたちが次々と不審死することを知る。好奇心と少しばかりの正義心、そして薬屋の知識を使い、その謎を調べ始めてから猫猫の運命は大きく変わって…？
description.ru: В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?!
description.pt-br: Na corte imperial, uma jovem é colocada em servidão, Maomao. A história está apenas começando para a médica/apotecária do distrito da luz vermelha, enquanto circulam rumores de que a vida dos filhos do imperador foi de curta duração. Sua natureza curiosa e sede de conhecimento a levam à ação. Para satisfazer a sua curiosidade, esta jovem médica/apotecária irá investigar a origem! O que está mudando na corte imperial..!?

description.en:
Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.

Volume 1: 17-21

- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita, 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**
A strange world where aliens have taken over the human world, and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.

- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa, 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**
To Sasaki, his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true, no matter how low the odds. Yet one day, trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation, Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.

- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku, 恋は盲目)**
A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?

- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**
A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.

Volume 2: 22-26

- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody, 人魚ラプソディ)**
In a world where sirens are common, the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea, when a strange siren approaches him…

- Chapter 2. **"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou, 目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**
A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!

- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta, 予言のナユタ)**
A tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world, and her brother.

- Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane, 妹の姉)**
A story about sisters aspiring to be artists.

description.en:
Raniel Van Trias, the Ashen Wizard, is a highly skilled mage set on defeating the Demon King. After years of fighting alongside the renowned Hero's Party and multiple encounters with the Demon King, he is ousted from the party, left with a curse on his heart, forced to lose half his lifespan, and transformed into a woman! 

Undeterred, Raniel becomes an assistant professor at the Royal Apelia Academy as Rania and searches for a way to lift the curse, oblivious to how challenging his task may be...

---

[Official Japanese release](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/148780)

[Official French release](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/1483)
description.ko:
마왕을 무찌르고 세상을 구원하기 위해 모인 최강의 용사파티가 있었다.

하지만 마왕 토벌엔 관심이 없고편한 전장만 찾는 용사 파티에 환멸을 느낀 잿빛 마법사 라니엘은,결국 파티를 때려치우고 고향으로 돌아와 스승을 만난다.그런 그에게 라니엘의 스승인 로셀은명문 아카데미, 아플리아의 조교수 자리를 권하게 된다.

"아니, 이걸 왜 못하지?"
"그냥 회로 생성하고 쓰면 되는데?"

하지만 세계관 최강자도 막상 가르침에는 소질이 없는 듯 한데...

어찌저찌 아플리아 아카데미에 취직하게 된 인류 최강 전력.먼치킨 마법사의 좌충우돌 아카데미 조교수기가 시작된다!

We're ready to activate Super Dogeza toward basically everybody!

A collection of works by the popular manga artist of Koha-Ace, Keikenchi, has finally arrived. Included in this volume are the ultra-rare collaborations with Prisma Illya, Kantai Collection and Lucky☆Star! It's a volume that's sure to get you hooked on the world of Keikenchi! description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

title.en: Go! Ina Junior High Ping-Pong Club

description.en:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.

After countless regressions, Persepe finally conquers all five male protagonists in a harrowing reverse harem game. Just when she thinks she’s free, a message appears:  

*Secret Mode unlocked! Find the true male lead to escape.*  

Hope reignites — she only needs to woo the real protagonist to return to her original world. But there’s one problem...

"So… who’s the real male lead?"

With no clear answers and hidden challenges, Persepe must navigate shifting alliances, cryptic clues, and her own growing feelings. 

Can she uncover the truth and finally break free? Or will she remain trapped in the game forever?
description.fr:
Précépé, coincée dans un jeu otome sombre, a enduré d’innombrables régressions.

Finalement, elle réussit à conquérir les cinq héros masculins !

Pleine d’espoir de pouvoir enfin quitter le jeu, c’est à ce moment-là qu’un message apparaît :

“Trouve le véritable héros masculin”, annonçant l’ouverture d’un mode secret !

Si elle conquiert le véritable héros, elle pourra rentrer chez elle !

Mais alors, qui est ce véritable héros ?
description.ko:
피폐 역하렘 게임에 빙의되어 수많은 회귀를 반복한 프레세페. 결국 다섯명의 남자 주인공을 공략 하는데에 성공하는데!

게임을 드디어 나갈 수 있다는 희망을 가졌지만 그 순간, 진짜 남자 주인공을 찾으라는 안내 메세지와 함께 열린 시크릿 모드!

진짜 남자주인공을 공략하기만 하면 돌아갈 수 있겠네!

그래서, 진짜 남자 주인공이 누군데?

description.en: General of the Three Kingdoms, Kongming had struggled his whole life, facing countless battles that made him into the accomplished strategist he was. So on his deathbed, he wished only to be reborn into a peaceful world...and was sent straight to modern-day party-central, Tokyo! Can even a brilliant strategist like Kongming adapt to the wild beats and even wilder party people?!
description.ja: 五丈原の戦いで死期を迎えた名軍師・諸葛亮孔明は、若い肉体に戻り、現代日本へと転生した！ 渋谷のパリピ達に誘われ、たどり着いたのはダンスミュージックが鳴り響くチャラめなクラブ。そこでシンガーを目指す月見英子と出逢い、孔明の二度目の人生が幕を開けた！ 三国志時代、天下泰平のために生きた彼は、なんの為に生きるのか－－!!
description.ko:
오장원 전투에서 최후를 맞이한 명군사 제갈량(공명)은
젊은 육체로 돌아가 현대 일본에 환생한다!
시부야의 파티피플들에게 이끌려 도착 곳은
댄스 뮤직이 울려 퍼지는 경박스러운 클럽.
그곳에서 가수를 꿈꾸는 츠키미 에이코와 만나며
공명의 두 번째 인생이 막을 연다!
description.ru: Знаменитый стратег и военачальник Чжугэ Лян (Кунмин), погибший в битве при Годжохаре в полях Учжан, вернулся в молодое тело и перевоплотился в современной Японии, где он встретился с начинающей певицей Цукими Эйко, песни которой запали ему в сердце.
description.vi: Bậc thầy quân sự nổi tiếng - Gia Cát Lượng Khổng Minh - người đã chết trong trận Ngũ Trượng Nguyên trở lại với cơ thể khi còn trẻ và tái sinh về Nhật Bản hiện đại. Được những người mê tiệc tùng ở Shibuya dẫn đi, Khổng Minh đã tới hộp đêm vang vọng tiếng nhạc EDM. Ở đó Khổng Minh đã gặp Tsukimi Eiko, người có mục tiêu trở thành ca sĩ, cũng chính là người đã vén lên tấm màn cuộc sống thứ hai của ông. Người sống vì thiên hạ thái bình ở thời Tam Quốc như ông sẽ sống vì điều gì đây...!?
description.pt-br: General dos Três Reinos, Kongming lutou toda a sua vida, enfrentando inúmeras batalhas que o transformaram no estrategista talentoso que ele era. Então, em seu leito de morte, ele desejava apenas renascer em um mundo pacífico… e foi enviado direto para o centro de festas moderno, Tóquio! Pode até mesmo um estrategista brilhante como Kongming se adaptar às batidas selvagens e às pessoas festeiras ainda mais selvagens?!
description.zh-hk: 三國時代的孔明在五丈原抱憾離世，如今他恢復成年輕時的模樣，以一身古時打扮來到現代日本‧澀谷。突兀的裝扮讓人以為他是在COSPLAY，後來被人帶往夜店狂歡，他在那裡認識了一心想成為歌手的月見英子。聽了她的歌聲大為感動，於是自告奮勇擔任她的軍師！來到現代，孔明要如何發揮他的軍事長才來協助英子完成「霸業」呢…？

description.en: The spin-off of "My Dress-Up Darling", [Kisekae Ningyou de Chu ♡], has started serialization with a chaotic yet cute vibe

He is Lu Wu Wei. Seven years ago, he was a nobody. In the midst of family infighting and power struggles, he was framed by traitors, expelled from his family, and stripped of his abilities, earning the nickname “Shame of the Capital.” Seven years passed, and Lu Wu Wei became the most accomplished man alive, invincible in the world. His personal guard, all legendary War Gods, are honored in history as the Da Xue Dragon Cavalry.
description.vi: Hắn là Lục Vô Vi, bảy năm trước hắn chỉ là kẻ tầm thường. Trong cuộc đấu tranh gia tộc, giao tiếp quyền lực, hắn bị kẻ gian hãm hại, bị trục xuất khỏi gia tộc phế bỏ tu vi, mọi người gọi g hắn là "Sự sỉ nhục của kinh thành". Bảy năm thời gian lưu chuyển, Lục Vô Vi trở thành một người hoàn toàn khác. Vô địch tại thế gian, mà thân vệ dưới tay hắn đều là đỉnh phong chiến thần, thành viên đều ghi tên sử sách, được thế nhân gọi là Đại Tuyết Long Kỵ
description.zh: 他是陆无为，七年前的他碌碌无为。家族内斗，权力交接，他遭奸人陷害，被逐出家族废去修为，人们称他“京城之耻”。七年时光流转，陆无为成为最为有为的人。无敌于世间，而他手下的亲卫皆为巅峰战神，成员皆名垂青史，被世人称为大雪龙骑。

title.en: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon: Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚　～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.en: The Hero and the Sage, Reincarnated and Engaged
The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple

altTitles.pt-br: Reencarnado • O herói se casa com o sábio ~Depois de ficar noivo de um ex-rival, nos tornamos o casal mais forte~

description.en:
In a world ravaged by war and conflict, Hero Raid Freeden and Sage Eluria Caldwin clashed time and time again over fifty long years as the strongest soldiers of their respective nations. However, their long-standing rivalry came to an inevitable yet bitter end with Eluria’s sudden death. A thousand years later, Raid finds he has been reincarnated—and so has Eluria! The world may now be at peace, but the two have an unsettled rivalry between them and the mystery of their reincarnation looms ominously over their heads. There’s so much that needs to be done, so they decide to...get engaged and attend the Royal Institute of Magic together?!

---
**Links** 

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-hero-and-the-sage-reincarnated-and-engaged)
* [NovelUpdates](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/reincarnated-%e2%80%a2-the-hero-marries-the-sage-after-becoming-engaged-to-a-former-rival-we-became-the-strongest-couple/) (Temporary, Bug cuts this url when saved in the NU field)
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?
description.pt-br:
Reid, um jovem herói com a maior força física, e Elria, uma bela sábia com a maior habilidade mágica.

Eles continuaram a lutar como rivais em nações inimigas opostas, mas seu relacionamento chegou ao fim com a morte repentina de Elria... Então, mil anos depois,

Reencarnou em um mundo onde a magia reina suprema, mas aquele que manteve a força física mais forte de sua vida anterior, Reid, se reuniu com Elria, que também reencarnou—

"Ei, Reid, quero que você se case comigo."

"…Huh?"

Os dois, que se tornaram o casal amoroso inconsciente mais forte em mil anos, matricularam-se na Royal Magic Academy para decidir quem é mais forte!

description.en: The story centers around Ange, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.
description.ja: 100年前に始まった人類とAIの戦争は、人類が電気を放棄することで決着した。電気を失った世界に生きる、最後の電気人形・アンジュと電気人形に育てられた人間・エリオの近未来スチームパンク冒険譚――。

altTitles.th: บันทึกตำนานอัศดงคต

description.en: The original journey to the west to retrieve the Sutra was a conspiracy plotted by the Heavens! Just after a few decades, the Sutra has vanished. The Heavens search for the Sutra with plans to use it with corrupted intentions. In order for the Sutra to not fall into the hands of Heaven, the journey to the west will begin once again.

“My mother’s killer, the one who scarred my face forever, and even stole my fiancé—Kanna.”  

This time, I’ll take everything back.  

But the idea of rewriting the past was nothing more than my arrogance.  

“No matter how hard you struggle, you’ll never beat me, Linette.”  

A relentless battle begins between two sisters—one who lost everything and another who took it all.

A global anomaly has occurred, and monsters have invaded. Monster trainers now bear the burden of saving human civilization. After Xiao Xingyu crosses over, he awakens the “God-tier Monster Training System”. By opening the Eye of the Demonic God, he can see through all hidden evolution paths of monsters, activate their hidden bloodlines, and unlock infinite evolution… A husky can evolve into the Hellhound! A fairy can mutate into the Twelve-Winged Blazing Angel! Hatching a dragon egg can summon the Nine-Spirited Candle Dragon!”

Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.
description.pl: Kiedy bezwzględny lord Tiwakan przejmuje królestwo Nauk, księżniczka Liene Arsac staje przed niemożliwym wyborem: poślubić swojego porywacza lub patrzeć, jak jej ojczyzna się rozpada. Ale lord Tiwakan pragnie nie tylko władzy; pożąda Liene, a jego oddanie wzbudza w niej mieszankę strachu i niezaprzeczalnego przyciągania. Ponieważ jej były narzeczony, Lafitte, wciąż jest uznawany za zaginionego, Liene musi zdecydować, czy zaufać obietnicom Tiwakana, czy też mieć nadzieję na ratunek. Gdy niebezpieczne sekrety wychodzą na jaw, decyzja Liene może zmienić los Nauk - i jej własnego serca - na zawsze.

title.en: Leveling Up Fast with Divine Measurement Skills

altTitles.ja-ro: Kami Haka Skill de Saisoku Leveling

altTitles.ja: 神測スキルで最速レベリング

description.en: In Japan, where explorers excel at dungeon conquering, Namiki Haruka, who remains weak even at level 100, is ridiculed by society as a premature weakling. However, after his own death triggers a transformation, he acquires the unique skill 'Divine Measurement' and begins to awaken.

altTitles.en: A Former Brave Resident in the Dungeon

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン暮らしの元勇者
ダンジョン暮らしの元勇者 THE COMIC

description.en:
After killing the Demon Lord, Blum Dilmond was pursued by the kingdom and forced to leave the country. While spending days trying to avoid the assassins aiming at his neck, he suddenly came up with an idea. He could hide inside the dungeon that was once the Demon Lord’s hideout. If it’s there, then he could be safe.   
  
Without hesitating Blum went into the dungeon, but then he met someone unexpected in the lower levels, one of his former companions with whom he fought side by side against the Demon Lord. Moreover, a maid, called Irene, who once served the Demon Lord is also there. And so since their interests happened to match, the three of them decided to cooperate together to rebuild the worn-out dungeon, working earnestly in order to turn it into their own safe paradise.

altTitles.th: ปฏิบัติการแปลงโฉมลูกสาวเจ้าพ่อ

description.en: A story about an ordinary boy named Mekh, whose life is about to change the moment he accidentally hit the infamous and easily-misuderstood girl named Saran.
